name: TectonicGiraffe
description:
Created during the GMTK GameJam 2020

A mini game inspired by QWOP where you guide the out-of-control giraffe to fresh and delicious apples!

Try to handle the ever growing number of neck joints, wobbliness and the time attack using W,A,S,D.

The source code is available on github:
https://github.com/AnJ95/tectonicGiraffe

We also had a great time at a lake during the Jam, which didnt help anything in the development process. Additional procrastination studies will be conducted to verify this experiment.
